Package Model

Class Mighta

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
Model.MovableObject
Model.Entity
Model.Enemy
Model.Mighta
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Observable
public class Mighta extends Enemy
The Mighta class represents a type of enemy in the game that can attack the player if the player is within a specified range. Mighta is a subclass of Enemy and has specific behavior for detecting whether the player is within attack range.

    • Mighta

      public Mighta(double x, double y)
      Constructs a Mighta object with the specified initial coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the X-coordinate of the Mighta
      y - the Y-coordinate of the Mighta

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(List<GameObject> others, Player player)
      Moves the Mighta based on the position of the player and other game objects. If the player is within attack range and the Mighta is not in the "caught" state, the Mighta is allowed to attack.
      Overrides:
      move in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      others - a list of other game objects in the game
      player - the player object whose position is used for determining attack range
